home.noDemandFound: No market demand insights for your area.
home.myYieldTrendDescription: This chart shows your recorded actual yield performance over time from your crop plans. Use it to track your farm's productivity and identify trends for improvement.
home.myYieldTrendInsight: Click here for detailed yield analytics and to understand your past performance.
home.generalYieldTrendDescription: This chart displays general yield trends for common crops in your region. It provides a benchmark to compare your farm's performance against broader averages.
home.generalYieldTrendInsight: Explore regional yield data to inform your crop selection and management strategies.
home.myDemandForecastDescription: This chart shows historical demand trends for popular crops in your preferred local market. It helps you understand market fluctuations relevant to your area.
home.myDemandForecastInsight: Analyze local demand to optimize your planting and selling times for better prices.
home.generalDemandForecastDescription: This chart presents general market demand trends across broader regions. It offers a wider perspective on crop demand dynamics beyond your immediate locality.
home.generalDemandForecastInsight: View comprehensive market analytics to anticipate broader market shifts and make strategic decisions.
home.noYieldData: No personal yield data available yet. Record your harvests to see trends.
home.noDemandData: No local demand trend data available. Check back later.
home.noGeneralYieldData: No general yield trend data available. Try selecting a different crop or district.
home.noGeneralDemandData: No general demand trend data available. Try selecting a different location or crop.
home.recordHarvestSubtitle: Enter details for your completed harvests
